overview:
Shirley is a co-founder and CEO at Yooguide. Yooguide, the Funday Genie, is a start up that brings a fresh and easy approach to how we spend our free time, making it zero effort and planning and keeping it all fun and exciting.

Shirley is a strategy, finance and business development professional. She has over 5 years of experience and strategy consulting in a variety of industries (focusing mainly in telecom and high-tech) both in Israel and New York. As an investment banker she advised on large IPO deals, M&A’s and private equity raising. Prior to founding Yooguide, she was Director of Business Development at EnergyMind (a cleantech incubator) and did business development for cleantech start ups.
